Confirming that we have added the Bathurst Flyer to the site's homepage.



Here's the link: https://unearth-ed.com.au/

Let us know if you would like further changes.

Date: Thursday, 31 March 2022 at 4:10 pm
To: Shepson | Arts <art@shepson.com.au>
Subject: RE: Bathurst Flyer

Sorry a few little tweaks almost there.

  • Under Discover Bathurst: 2 or 3 day tours

  • Under tour options the following grammatical changes

  • The Three Sisters ok as is

  • Remove check in, just have Bathurst Goldfields accommodation

  • Dinner at accommodation underneath

  • Colonial music ( no capital M in Music) or Line dancing evening ( please note no capitals for dancing and evening)

  • Aboriginal design, art & Boomerang throwing ( please note removal of capitals)

  • Sheep & cattle show

  • Drive around Mount Panorama

  • Bathurst courthouse

  • The original location…….river.

  • The excursion grounds line is all ok

  • Bathurst cemetery

Thanks Deb

From: Marketing - Unearth-ed <marketing@unearth-ed.com.au>
Date: Thursday, 31 March 2022 at 2:48 pm
To: Shepson | Arts <art@shepson.com.au>
Cc: Luke Everingham <Luke@shepson.com.au>
Subject: RE: Bathurst Flyer

Yep ok still not quite hitting the mark, can you please make the following changes:

  • Remove behind the scenes and put in "Experience the true history of Australia's oldest inland British settlement."

  • Swap Bathurst car races photo to the bottom.

  • In the introduction wording please start a new paragraph 'The renowned hands on gold tours have a strong ( not stronger focus)……….goldfields village.

  • New paragraph- This tour exposes students to…………..food security

  • Remove all last paragraph

  • Please remove day1 and day 2 layout and replace with Tour options include: then list of all the activities from day1 and day2 ( remove depart from school) and then add the following

  • Bathurst Courthouse

  • The original location of the Bathurst Settlement on Macquarie river

  • The excursion grounds of the notorious Ribbon gang

  • Bathurst Cemetery

  • Leave the rest as is.

Hope that makes sense.

Thanks, sl

From: Marketing - Unearth-ed <marketing@unearth-ed.com.au>
Date: Monday, 28 March 2022 at 4:14 pm
To: Shepson | Arts <art@shepson.com.au>
Cc: Luke Everingham <Luke@shepson.com.au>
Subject: RE: Bathurst Flyer

Hi team, need to spruce this up a bit more.

Please note some changes: Introductory words.

Title: Discover Bathurst - the oldest inland British settlement in Australia

  • Unearth-Ed Bathurst educational tours are created with a strong focus on meeting a range of cross curricular outcomes to optimise a schools time away from the classroom. The renowned hands on gold tours have a stronger focus on life in colonial Australia within a carefully reconstructed 1800s goldfield's village. This tour exposes students to the Chinese migrant experience, history of colonial housing, changes to medicine and personal hygiene, problems with access to clean water on the goldfields and problems with food security.

  • Experience the true history of Australia's oldest inland settlement. Tour locations include Bathurst Courthouse, original location of the Bathurst settlement on the Macquarie River, the execution grounds of the notorious Ribbon Gang, Bathurst Cemetery and the Bathurst Historical Society Museum.

  • Can you please put the Unearth-Ed logo back in the square Please include the car racing photo attached a nd replace the least attractive photo

  • A stronger call to action- Call now to discuss the Bathurst experience with your friendly Unearthed education tour specialist (then all the contact details)

Thanks, can I get it by 10am tomorrow, sorry to be a pain.

Thanks, sl

.

From: Nadine New <bookings@unearth-ed.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 15 February 2022 3:31 PM
To: Marketing - Unearth-ed <marketing@unearth-ed.com.au>
Subject: Bathurst Flyer

Hey Scott

Here are the details for a Bathurst flyer, I think a similar layout to the Canberra High Tea will look great. Unearth-Ed branding instead of Crowthers.

Day One

The Three Sisters

Check into Bathurst Goldfields

Gold Panning

Damper Cooking

Dinner at accommodation

Colonial Music or Line Dancing Evening

Day Two

Aboriginal Design, Art & Boomerang Throwing

Sheep & Cattle Show

Drive around Mount Panorama

Depart for School

PRICE

Price is dependent on student & teacher numbers, school location and style of accommodation

BOOKINGS

Contact the team at Unearth-Ed for a personalised quote for your School

(02) 9540 0999 or bookings@unearth-ed.com.au

I have also attached a few photos that I've been using in Tourwriter. If you need so more info on the accommodation the website is https://bathurstgoldfields.com.au/

Let me know if you need anything else.

Cheers

Nadine New Sales & Booking Consultant

Unearth-Ed PO Box 511, Caringbah NSW 1495

Ph: 02 9540 0999

Email bookings@unearth-ed.com.au

Web: www.unearth-ed.com.au
